entry.title: SharpKit extension/plugin called UnobtrusiveFeatures
entry.content: SharpKit, the C# to javascript compiler, is super, but there are some things that irritate me and one them is the export definition.

entry.title: Technology behind this site
entry.content: Here is a technology overrview and workflow behind this website. This site is hosted at GitHub and pregenerated from ASP.NET MVC web application.

entry.title: JavascriptSerializer in the RegisterStartupScript
entry.content: Startup script behavior in the ASP.NET WebForms inside UpdatePanel containing script tags.

entry.title: Creating route links and passing-in values
entry.content: How hard creating links to blog posts can be and how we make it (from our point of view) easier.
